mapper.select: SELECT NO, S_CODE, S_YEAR, S_MON, S_DAY, S_HOUR, S_MIN, S_SEC, FILE_CNT, USE_CHK, REG_DT, UPT_DT FROM T_RCV_INFO ORDER BY REG_DT ASC
SELECT ID, NAME, PASS, EMAIL, AUTH_CHK, LAST_DT, REG_DT FROM T_USR_INFO ORDER BY REG_DT ASC
SELECT ID, NAME, PASS, EMAIL, AUTH_CHK, LAST_DT, REG_DT FROM T_USR_INFO WHERE ID=#{IDX}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_USR_INFO ( ID, NAME, PASS, EMAIL, AUTH_CHK, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{pass}, #{email}, #{auth_chk}, current_timestamp )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_USR_INFO SET NAME = #{name} , PASS = #{pass} , EMAIL = #{email} , AUTH_CHK = #{auth_chk} WHERE ID = #{IDX}
